dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So Kazakhstan just named Sergey Viktorov as their new ambassador to Sri Lanka.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So Kazakhstan just named Sergey Viktorov as their new ambassador to Sri Lanka.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: By presidential decree, Sergey Viktorov has been named Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Kazakhstan to the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right, and uh, they also gave Olzhas Suleimenov, who's already in Sweden, the Denmark post concurrently.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right, and uh, they also gave Olzhas Suleimenov, who's already in Sweden, the Denmark post concurrently.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Olzhas Suleimenov, Kazakhstan's current Ambassador to the Kingdom of Sweden, has been concurrently appointed as Ambassador to the Kingdom of Denmark.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's a pretty efficient move, like killing two birds with one stone, diplomatically speaking.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's a pretty efficient move, like killing two birds with one stone, diplomatically speaking.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And President Tokayev didn't stop there—he also appointed someone new to Mongolia.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And President Tokayev didn't stop there-he also appointed someone new to Mongolia.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev also appointed a new ambassador to Mongolia.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It feels like a real reshuffling moment, you know? Like they're strengthening ties across the board.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It feels like a real reshuffling moment, you know? Like they're strengthening ties across the board.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And earlier, he was receiving credentials from seven other countries' ambassadors in Astana.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And earlier, he was receiving credentials from seven other countries' ambassadors in Astana.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, Tokayev received the credentials of newly appointed ambassadors from seven countries during a formal ceremony held in Astana.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That's a lot of new faces all at once. Must be quite the busy season over there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a lot of new faces all at once. Must be quite the busy season over there.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. I wonder if this signals a broader foreign policy push from Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. I wonder if this signals a broader foreign policy push from Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Could be—maybe focusing on both South Asia and Europe at the same time.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Could be-maybe focusing on both South Asia and Europe at the same time.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And keeping an eye on regional partners like Mongolia, too. Smart positioning, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And keeping an eye on regional partners like Mongolia, too. Smart positioning, honestly.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. It'll be interesting to see how these appointments play out over the next year or so.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. It'll be interesting to see how these appointments play out over the next year or so.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, like what kind of agreements or partnerships might come from these moves.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, like what kind of agreements or partnerships might come from these moves.
